description: Art Hub Studios will be holding studio tours as part of its Open Studios event, explaining the history of the Industrial Estate, its position within the Thames Barrier & Bowater Road Conservation Area and its current use as art studios.

factsheet.heading: History
paragraphs: A brief look at the history of the Industrial Estate and where the studios are located, which is on the site of the historic Siemens Brothers works, an early multinational telecommunications company.

factsheet.heading: Present
paragraphs: We look at two buildings on the Industrial Estate and their current use by Art Hub Studios to provide artist studio space to 170+ artists.

factsheet.heading: Future Development
paragraphs: A look at the area today and its position within the Thames Barrier & Bowater Road Conservation Area. The listing of certain buildings by English Heritage and Royal Greenwich and the future development of the site

images.title: View from the Q14, Thames Path extension
View from Building 28 across section of Westminster Industrial Estate

name: Art Hub Open Studios
